General.Name: Leo Systems
General.Description: Leo Systems, Inc. provides financial related system integration development, financial automation machine, and after-sales services in Taiwan. It offers banknote fitness sorter, cash deposit machines, bank audit management systems, recycler ATM, teller cash recycler, automatic bank payment kiosks, image and process control systems, foreign currency cash exchange teller machines, medical bill payment kiosks, paperless management systems, palm vein solution, and bonus point exchange systems, as well as credit card enrollment/ verify/card issuing process flow control systems and automatic equipment value-added integration development. Leo Systems, Inc. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
